mapper.select: select la.ability, la.author_id as authorId, la.create_time as createTime, la.disabled, la.id, la.language_id as languageId, la.righttimes, la.totaltimes from t_language_ability where la.disabled = 0 and la.author_id = #{authorId}
mapper.update: update t_language_ability set ability = #{ability}, author_id = #{authorId}, disabled = #{disabled}, language_id = #{languageId}, righttimes = #{righttimes}, totaltimes = #{totaltimes} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(*), language_id as languageId from t_myquiz q left join t_item i on q.item_id = i.id where q.author_id = #{userId} and q.author_id != i.author_id and q.answerstate != -1 and q.answerstate != 2 and q.language_id is not null group by language_id order by language_id

select count(*) as count, answerstate, language_id as languageId from t_myquiz q left join t_item i on q.item_id = i.id where q.author_id = #{userId} and q.author_id != i.author_id and q.answerstate != -1 and q.answerstate != 2 and q.language_id is not null group by answerstate, language_id order by language_id
mapper.insert: insert into t_language_ability( ability, author_id, create_time, disabled, id, language_id, righttimes, totaltimes ) values ( #{ability}, #{authorId}, #{createTime}, #{disabled}, #{id}, #{languageId}, #{righttimes}, #{totaltimes} )
